The story centers around a young woman named Clare Cassidy, who writes a glowing review of a new product, only to have her review mysteriously deleted. As Sam delves deeper into the case, he uncovers a web of secrets, lies, and deceit that leads him to question everything.

"The Deception" is a masterful blend of psychological suspense, clever plot twists, and a dash of humor. Fiona Barton's writing is engaging, and her characters are well-developed and relatable.

While Sam is the protagonist, the story also features a cast of complex and intriguing characters, including Clare, a charismatic and enigmatic woman at the center of the mystery.

If you enjoy a good mystery with a clever plot and a dash of humor, I highly recommend "The Deception"!
